head.title: BUSINESS PROPOSER REQUESTING CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP

body.p:
ATTENTION
DEAR SIR.
Mr.Dddddddd Rrrrr
I am sending you this fax for a purpose that can favour both of us Sir. I konw this mail may be a surprise to you cause we have not mait before. But have Sir what i am going to shear here with you is not a child game neither i am trying to dub you and i will only want you to beleive this purpose cause it min not come again.
What we have here is a consignment that contain ( 20.00000Million DL) tweenty Million of dollers. This Money is uncleared because the owner of the Money died some years ago. and belong to one Mr. Fred yakubu Amendu. And the only surviving son and I have been looking forward to clime back this Money and there is no way. But a condition and that can only be done by a well know person who have a company and we beleive that is you that is why this information was directed to you Sir.
This Money can not be climed by Me or any bady neither the family becuase of the problem they are going through they are after the son becuase they have find out that he is going to get back all that belongs to him but without this Money. I beleive you understand Me. This is why this purpose was send to you. Sir why i said you should call for this Money is to stand as a business partner of this late Mr. Fred yakubu Amendu. The son have said that who ever stand on this purpose to bring at this Money. He will pay the what ever the charge is. And this surviving son is only 20years of age.
I am Mr. Micheal Ado Santigo. And I do know that through your support we can carry on we this tranxation. So Sir before we go further i will want you to know that i am not asking you to send me Money to bring out this consignment till you know more about this tranxation and this purpose will need you Attention there In Madrid Spain. Till then you can only contact the people in charge of this Money with this contact.
Email> ( john_kenedy_418@hotmail.com) Email> ( barris_jose_marri@hotmail.com)
Personal email contact is
Email> ( micheal_ado@hotmail.com)
So hope to hear from you soon as porsible Sir. You can only contact this people through mail first before their phone contact. Till then thanks you and god bless.
BEST REGARD
SINCAERLY
